name: Swiftness
description: Add 1 to the Move characteristic of this fighter.

name: Resilience
description: Add 1 to the Toughness characteristic of this fighter.

name: Fortitude
description: Add 4 to the Wounds characteristic of this fighter.

name: Ferocity
description: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of one of this fighter's melee weapons.

name: Might
description: Add 1 to the Strength characteristic of one of this fighter's weapons.

name: Brutality
description: Add 1 to the first Damage characteristic of one of this fighter's melee weapons.

name: Savagery
description: Add 1 to the second Damage characteristic of one of this fighter's melee weapons.

name: Spite
specialEffect: Make up to one 'free' reaction per battle round as if spending a level of renown.
description: Make up to one 'free' reaction per battle round as if spending a level of renown.

name: Destiny
specialEffect: Begin the battle with one saved wild dice.
description: Begin the battle with one saved wild dice.
